activities:
Robbins-Gioia Incororated offers management consulting and other related professional and information technology (I/T) services to governments and commercial businesses worldwide (NAICS 541611, 541512 and 541614).  RG's business services involve the marketing, sale and delivery of:
-Program management advisory and consulting services
-Related training and mentoring services
-Tailored service offerings/solutions (packaged capabilities)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Computer Services - (CSV)Financial Services - (FNS)Education & Training - (EDS)
recoursemech: Individuals who wish to file a complaint or who take issue with this Policy should direct such communication to Robbins-Gioia via e-mail to safeharbor@robbinsgioia.com. Robbins-Gioia will explain the process to be followed when filing a complaint. Filing a complaint in English will expedite the process. Robbins-Gioia will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved between Robbins-Gioia and the complainant, complaints will be submitted to the American Arbitration Association (“AAA”) for mediation and then if necessary, to binding arbitration for final resolution.  Information about AAA services can be found at its website:  www.adr.org; EU Data Protections Authorities for HR data
